name: PiHomeMaster
0:
”Alexa, start pi home master”
”turn on bedroom light”
”turn off kitchen light”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pi home master
des: You can control you home electrical appliances by voice command. You can on or off lamp or you can control the speed of the fan. You will be required a Raspberry pi working as MQTT client. Details: https://www.hackster.io/taifur/voice-controlled-smart-home-36e37e
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
